item.title: How can I do talk an npc?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I got this code ready to go in Client.Java but I don’t know where to put it exactly:

sendFrame200(4901, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902);
sendFrame126(“HEY WHATS UP ADD YOUR TEXT HERE”, 4903);
sendFrame126(“MORE TEXT HERE”, 4904);
sendFrame126(“MORE TEXT HERE”, 4905);
sendFrame126(“MORE TEXT HERE”, 4906);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
sendFrame164(4900);
NpcDialogueSend = true;

Thanks to help me if you do.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I do talk an npc?
